attributes.review: Took forever to download and once it finally did open it froze my entire phone. I couldn’t even turn it off! I had to buy a new phone when I had a perfect and semi new one that worked. Made me waste my money. WORST APP NEVER DOWNLOADING this cheeto heads 🟠app ever again!
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: This app took WEEKS to download. And it would make my phone crash whenever I used it!!! I could barely go in my socials or do anything!!! This loser made me lose so much and only AFTER I installed this app I started losing money from my bank account? UNACCEPTABLE
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!

attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible and I’m not just saying that because I don’t support trump. It was super slow and honestly made me feel like my brain had roaches. The app totally disgusts me and my family. I cry at the thought of Donald Trump being president again.
attributes.title: Worst ever!

attributes.review: Downloaded the app and it’s really glitchy I don’t know what happened couldn’t enter my number or do anything else except go to the starting screen.  Might be somehow my fault but that’s my experience. The idea behind it is good tho...

I tried this app because I love Donald trump he’s so amazing and I wanted to hear all of the REAL NEWS because the FAKE NEWS MEDIA is taking over and I wanted real FACTS.
INSTEAD
I got a glitchy phone and the app kept shutting down and it even made me go broke because it killed my phone😡😡
attributes.title: So bad!!

attributes.review: this app brought many rats in my house and took 20 weeks to download it was a horrible experience i would never want to have something like this ever again. i saw so much orange everywhere and i’m allergic to oranges so i had an allergic reaction and sadly died. I HATE THIS APP 😡😡
I downloaded this app and I think it bugged my phone. My phone is constantly glitching and crashes every time I open the app. Also gave my cat covid, 12/10 don’t recommend. Worst app, take it down.
attributes.title: highly not recommend

attributes.review: I’m just trying to support my president but the app keep glitching out every time I try to open it 😡🤬 trying to delete and redownload it but it turns off my phone when I try to delete it.
attributes.title: This thing did nothing 🧚🧚🧶🧶✨✨

attributes.review: This app was a TOTAL disaster from the start, I wanted to download this app to support our amazing racist president 🧚🏻🥰 it took about five hours to download, which wasn't problem because I understand Trump is slow at many things
attributes.title: Don't download this app

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app and it was so glitchy to the point that I could not do anything, and it kept crashing every time I tried to get into it, I would not recommend downloading this.
attributes.title: So Awful
